actions.recommendation: Family history of metabolic disease (increased blood pressure, high blood sugar, excess body fat around the waist, or abnormal cholesterol) is associated with an increased risk for you, so it's important you keep up with annual checks

Increased abdominal circumference is not limited to fat under the skin but also fat around the organs of your abdomen, linked with Type 2 diabetes, high BP& breathing problems. Eat whole unprocessed foods, get good sleep ,try manage stress
Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
